text:
Food delivery workers say that most chain restaurants (Chipotle, Subway, Applebee's) have barred them from using their bathrooms during coronavirus. This means workers can't wash their hands & are peeing in bottles and bushes, or just holding it for hours.
https://t.co/Sy2KO7hmAU
